author: jstrachan
msg: Added unit test case for the JSL tag library to ensure that I don't break it again by accident ;-)

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the JSL library so that its working properly again! Also added some extra debug logging that makes it easier to debug if things break again.
Will add some JUnit test cases shortly to ensure that we can test if JSL breaks again in the future.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added idea about a Betwixt tag library

author: jstrachan
msg: Reorganised the todo list in to core things, new tag libraries and patches to exisitng tag libraries.
Also added details of STX and Joost, which could be an interesting tag library to add to Jelly; a purely SAX based processing language similar to XSLT that does not require parsing to occur.
